mapper.sql: id, peopleid, community, pictureid, deviceid, capturetime, surl, burl, flag, similarity
mapper.insert: insert into t_people_recognize (id, peopleid, community, pictureid, deviceid, capturetime, surl, burl, flag, similarity) select #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{community,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pictureid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capturetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{surl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{similarity,jdbcType=FLOAT} from dual where not exists (select 1 from t_people_recognize where peopleid=#{peopleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deviceid=#{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and unix_timestamp(capturetime)>unix_timestamp(now())-#{filterTime,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_people_recognize
peopleid = #{peopleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pictureid = #{pictureid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
